description:
Once again Isis gets stood up by her would be boyfriend and is in a foul mood. Lorelei promises to cheer her up but Isis has heard that from her many times before.
Well... Lorelei keeps her promise this time by cleaning out her ass for some deep anal play, which she knows Isis will love, and proceeds to tease & taunt Isis to prove she is for real this time. Isis takes the advances for real & after some teasing puts Lorelei into the most restrictive bondage possible & fucks her teasing ass fast & deep!
Sometimes staying in with the girls is just the thing!
title: The Stand Up... not so bad sometimes
